title: 107_hr2313
content: Crane Tithe Tax Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) repeal the tax on corporations. (2) repeal the current tax rates for individuals and replace such rates with a ten percent tax on earned income. (3) provide amnesty for any tax liability prior to January 1, 2000. (4) repeal all specific exclusions from gross income, all deductions, and all credits. And (5) repeal subtitle B relating to estate, gift, and generation-skipping taxes.
